item.title: A constant disgrace, 14th September
item.description:
This road is a blight on the community. Dog mess - the whole way down. Every day. Rubbish - outside every door, every day, ripped open by animals. Please Greenwich Council - deal with the perpetrators. It is getting worse and worse and with even more shops being converted into low quality accomodation it seems it will continue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
